item.title: Early trade deadline questions: What's next for Giannis, Lakers and top contenders?
item.description: Early NBA trade deadline questions for Bucks, Lakers, Warriors and other top contenders, including biggest needs and what they can pull off.

item.title: Jimmy Butler, Steve Kerr and the Warriors' quest to solve the Jonathan Kuminga puzzle
item.description: Butler has taken on a mentorship role with Kuminga, who is still trying to find his role with the Warriors.

item.title: Grading preseason bold predictions for all 32 NHL teams
item.description: Some of our wild takes from September don't look so wild anymore. Others are way off-base. Here's an update.

item.title: Flyers to honor young cancer patients with pregame SkateSkins
item.description: The custom skate accessories were designed as part of the Hockey Fights Cancer initiative.

item.title: Men's College Basketball Power Rankings: Arizona rides hot start to No. 1
item.description: The Wildcats added another statement win to their early-season résumé, headlining this week's top-25 risers.
